import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get Staker Stats (Deprecated)"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/v1/stats/staker"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>

:::caution deprecated

This endpoint has been deprecated and may be replaced or removed in future versions of the API.

:::

[DEPRECATED] Fetches staker stats for babylon staking including tvl, total delegations, active tvl and active delegations. Please use /v2/staker/stats instead.
If staker_btc_pk query parameter is provided, it will return stats for the specific staker.
Otherwise, it will return the top stakers ranked by active tvl.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"description":"Public key of the staker to fetch","in":"query","name":"staker_btc_pk","schema":{"type":"string"}},{"description":"Pagination key to fetch the next page of top stakers","in":"query","name":"pagination_key","schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"List of top stakers by active tvl","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"description":"Paginated array response containing Phase-1 staker statistics.","properties":{"data":{"items":{"properties":{"active_delegations":{"type":"integer"},"active_tvl":{"type":"integer"},"staker_pk_hex":{"type":"string"},"total_delegations":{"type":"integer"},"total_tvl":{"type":"integer"}},"type":"object","title":"v1service.StakerStatsPublic"},"type":"array"},"pagination":{"description":"Pagination metadata for paginated API responses.","properties":{"next_key":{"type":"string"}},"type":"object","title":"types.PaginationResponse"}},"type":"object","title":"v1service.StakerStatsPublicArray"}}}},"400":{"description":"Error: Bad Request","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"description":"Standard error response returned by all API endpoints when an error occurs.","properties":{"err":{},"errorCode":{"enum":["INTERNAL_SERVICE_ERROR","VALIDATION_ERROR","NOT_FOUND","BAD_REQUEST","FORBIDDEN","UNPROCESSABLE_ENTITY","REQUEST_TIMEOUT"],"type":"string","x-enum-varnames":["InternalServiceError","ValidationError","NotFound","BadRequest","Forbidden","UnprocessableEntity","RequestTimeout"],"title":"types.ErrorCode"},"statusCode":{"type":"integer"}},"type":"object","title":"types.Error"}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
